data.title: Meet The Doctors
data.meta_description: Welcome to our Meet The Doctors page. Contact Pelandale Dental today at (209) 545-9282 or visit our office servicing Modesto, California
data.text:
Dr. Param Gill

Dr. Param Gill has over 20 years of clinical experience. His practice, which he established in 1997, is focused on Cosmetic, Implant and Family dentistry. His lifelong goal has been to bring affordable dental care to his patients in central valley. In addition to being a well-known Implant dentist, he is an award winning film writer and director, known for directing films which tackle diverse themes. His films are available on Netflix, Amazon and in theaters near you.

Education

DDS from Bapuji Dental College in India

Joint Masters Degree from University of Medicine and Dentistry of New Jersey and New Jersey Institute of Technology, 2003

Advanced Post-Doctoral

Training Surgical Implant Placement

10,000+ Implants Placed in patients ranging from age 17 to 98

Nationally Published Author on Dental Implants

Lectures Internationally on Dental Implants

Orthodontics

Invisalign®

Fastbraces®

Ceramic Braces

Laser

Gum Treatment

Cosmetic Dentistry

Professional Memberships ​

American Dental Association (ADA)

California Dental Association (CDA)

Dr. Rashmi Jain

Dr. Rashmi Jain received her Doctor of Dental Surgery Degree (DDS) from the University of Southern California’s Ostrow School of Dentistry, USA. Her prime interest lies in Cosmetic Dentistry, Geriatric Dentistry, and Implants. She is certified in Invisalign and appreciates working with patients with complex medical conditions. She believes that passion and dedication is the key to success, which reflects on her work. Dr. Jain continues to learn new and modern ways of practicing dentistry.

Dr. Jain is a member of the California Dental Association, American Society of Cosmetic Dentistry, Academy of General Dentistry, and the American Dental Association.

In her spare time, Dr. Jain enjoys painting, photography, and tennis. She is also an active member of many social organizations and loves to contribute back to her community through volunteer work with several dental humanitarian organizations.

Professional Memberships ​

American Dental Association (ADA)
